name: Zen Tiles
description:
A chilled pair matching game. Walk around the Ukioye inspired garden trying to match the pairs of stone tiles with patterns on the bottom. 

Controls-

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys - Shift to run

Check tile pattern - press E on a stone tile

Made using -

  • Game Engine - Godot
  • Image Editing - Affinity Photo
  • 3D Modelling - Blender
  • Audio - Ableton live lite, Audacity, Freesound.org, Spitfire LABS
  • Moodboard - PureRef
  • Project Managment - Notion

Credits -

  • Kenney.nl - Pattern pack
  • Skybox and mountains inspired by "Harvesting" by Shiro Kasamatsu (1953)
  • Stone SFX - https://freesound.org/people/daveincamas/sounds/44243/
  • Walk SFX - https://freesound.org/people/zepurple/sounds/540270/ 
  •  Water Trickle - https://freesound.org/people/tymorafarr/sounds/249666/
